pullRequest.title: [STORM-3661] handle exception when netty server receive unexpected message
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the change
In some (rare) cases, we observed netty-server might receive messages other than a List from a wrong source, and it will throw ClassCastException and terminate the worker process.
How was the change tested
Set netty server side to not using Sasl related ServerHandler while making client send sasl message, we observe the following message without worker getting killed
